transcricoesIA.title: Transcriptions & Insights with AI
transcricoesIA.resumo:
Redesign of the video conferencing ecosystem focused on centralizing recordings, transcriptions and AI insights.
The project automated post-meeting documentation, eliminating manual work and transforming an operational tool into a strategic sales asset, validated by high spontaneous adoption.
transcricoesIA.objetivo:
Centralize recordings, transcriptions and AI insights to eliminate manual management and noise in data sharing.
The focus was to transform meeting records into actionable intelligence for Sales, Support and Product teams, increasing the tool's competitiveness in the market.
transcricoesIA.desafio: Architect the unification of multiple data sources (video, calls and transcriptions) that were arranged in different locations, integrating a dense volume of information into a single high-performance flow, reducing the user's cognitive load without compromising user experience and technical feasibility.

meuPapel.title: Discovery & Strategy
meuPapel.desc: Friction diagnosis and competitive benchmarking for requirements definition.

meuPapel.title: Architecture & Interaction
meuPapel.desc: Journey redesign to integrate video and data into a single flow.

meuPapel.title: Technical Feasibility
meuPapel.desc: Alignment with engineering for AI feature implementation.

meuPapel.title: Validation & Refinement
meuPapel.desc: Usability adjustments based on qualitative feedback.

processoPesquisa.title: Legacy Audit
processoPesquisa.desc: Heuristic analysis of the previous version to map frictions and experience debts.

processoPesquisa.title: Internal Data
processoPesquisa.desc: Cross-referencing Support and Sales tickets to validate real pains and prioritize fixes.

processoPesquisa.title: Benchmarking
processoPesquisa.desc: Study of interaction patterns in players like Apollo, Fireflies, tl;dv and Bluedot.

processoPesquisa.title: Technical Feasibility
processoPesquisa.desc: Early validation with engineering to anticipate constraints and avoid rework.

descobertas.title: Access to Intelligence
descobertas.desc: Transform a simple "meeting log" into a searchable content hub (transcription and AI), eliminating the need to watch the full video.

descobertas.title: Truth Centralization
descobertas.desc: Unify internal and external calls in a single view, removing the friction of searching for records within sales pipelines.

descobertas.title: Collaboration Unlock
descobertas.desc: Easy sharing so information flows between Sales, Support and Product without manual barriers.

descobertas.title: Viralization Strategy
descobertas.desc: Automatic summary sending as Product-Led Growth leverage, stimulating spontaneous adoption by new users.

telas.descricao: Interface built on Leads2b's Design System, ensuring visual consistency and reducing the user's learning curve.
Immersive visualization with lateral data panel. The structure synchronizes video playback with transcription and AI insights, centralizing all meeting context in a single view.

Unified interface that integrates video player and Smart Insights. The layout allows simultaneous consumption of transcriptions, comments and AI insights, eliminating tab switching and maintaining focus on content.

Optimized sending flow for quick inclusion of multiple recipients. The interface ensures that knowledge generated in the meeting reaches the right people with few clicks, eliminating the need to write emails.

Use of Teaser (blur) pattern for advanced features. The interface reveals the information structure (Smart Insights) but restricts detail. This shows the tool's capability while generating intentional friction to encourage upgrading.

Activity scheduling tool integrated into the screen, reducing time-to-action. The user can schedule follow-ups the moment they identify an opportunity, eliminating switching between tabs and external calendar tools.

Application of the same visual model from video calls to audio recordings, ensuring that sales intelligence, such as transcription and AI analysis, is accessible and visually coherent, regardless of the source channel.

Summary email as a Product-Led Growth tool. By delivering immediate value (insights and transcription) to our customers' customers, we use access to full content as a strategic trigger to attract new registrations and expand the user base organically.

handoff.descricao: Following the Shift-Left technique that values Engineering involvement from ideation to align scope, stack and deadlines, we eliminated the risk of prototyping unfeasible solutions, ensured development fluidity and drastically reduced communication noise during handoff.
bullets: Navigation: Frames grouped by logical functionality
Consistency: Isolated local components for easier maintenance
Semantics: System of visual annotations (Info, Attention, Important) and integrated flowcharts to cover business rules not visible in the prototype, minimizing technical doubts

resultados.title: Operational Efficiency
resultados.desc: Centralization of assets (recording, transcription and AI) in a single hub, eliminating manual minute organization and freeing productive hours for teams.

resultados.title: Commercial Impact
resultados.desc: The new interface elevated the product's perceived value, being adopted by the Sales team as a competitive differentiator in demonstrations for new clients.

resultados.title: Growth & Adoption
resultados.desc: Automatic post-meeting redirection boosted organic feature discovery, naturally integrating it into the daily flow without marketing cost.

resultados.title: Trust Recovery
resultados.desc: Detractor users from the previous version became promoters of the new feature, validating the resolution of critical usability frictions.

licoes.title: Shift-Left Dev
licoes.desc: Technical validation in the ideation phase proved vital for calibration and rework elimination.

licoes.title: Growth Levers
licoes.desc: Automatic redirection showed that small flow interventions can generate more organic adoption than large features.

licoes.title: Data as Premise
licoes.desc: The experience reinforced that KPI definition must be born with the project, ensuring success measurement at rollout.

medicalOffice.title: Medical Office Redesign
medicalOffice.resumo:
UI/UX Redesign of the Medical Office web platform, which connects healthcare professionals without their own space to clinics with idle capacity.
The main goal was to redesign the interface, make it responsive and improve usability, while maintaining a familiar experience for existing users. The process included a Lean Inception workshop, product vision definition, persona creation and user journey mapping.
medicalOffice.objetivo:
Medical Office is a web platform that connects early-career healthcare professionals who don't have physical space for practice, with clinic owners who have idle spaces.
This way, it aims to meet the demand of multiple professionals, enabling income generation for owners through rental, while allowing early-career professionals to work in a fully equipped space.
medicalOffice.desafio: Redesign the tool making it more modern and responsive, facilitating use while maintaining the feel already acquired by users. The redesign needed to balance innovation with familiarity, ensuring a smooth transition for the existing user base.

meuPapel.title: Lean Inception
meuPapel.desc: Participation in collaborative workshop to align MVP with stakeholders and development team.

meuPapel.title: Research & Discovery
meuPapel.desc: Creation of CSD Matrix, personas and user journey mapping.

meuPapel.title: Interface Design
meuPapel.desc: Acting as sole designer after inception, creating high-fidelity prototypes.

meuPapel.title: Collaborative Handoff
meuPapel.desc: Integrated work with development team from conception.

processoPesquisa.title: Lean Inception
processoPesquisa.desc: Collaborative workshop with 2 Designers, 2 Developers, COO, CTO and 3 founders to define MVP.

processoPesquisa.title: CSD Matrix
processoPesquisa.desc: Survey of Certainties, Suppositions and Doubts for team alignment on the product.

processoPesquisa.title: Current Vision
processoPesquisa.desc: Documentation of existing platform to understand friction points and identify improvement opportunities.

processoPesquisa.title: Product Vision
processoPesquisa.desc: Definition of what the product is, is not, does and doesn't do to avoid ambiguities and define scope.

processoPesquisa.title: Personas
processoPesquisa.desc: Creation of three user profiles: Administrator, Landlord and Tenant, with their specific needs.

processoPesquisa.title: Sequencing
processoPesquisa.desc: Feature prioritization by importance, business value and technical feasibility to create logical development sequence.

descobertas.title: Benchmarking
descobertas.desc: Analysis of platforms like Airbnb, Booking and QuintoAndar to identify market patterns and reduce friction.

descobertas.title: User Flows
descobertas.desc: Creation of detailed flowcharts indicating the path from starting point to final objective of each journey.

descobertas.title: Technical Debt
descobertas.desc: Identification of technical limitations that impacted redesign, requiring scope adjustments for some routines.

descobertas.title: Problematic Registration
descobertas.desc: The previous flow was slow with extensive form; we implemented step-by-step process more intuitive.

prototipo.intro: The final prototype was developed considering responsiveness, stakeholder desires, insights obtained from detailed benchmarking and compliance with main usability heuristics.

telas.descricao: The landing page was redesigned based on guidelines defined by stakeholders, maintaining the visual style desired by founders without compromising style guide standards or usability criteria.
Some technical debt limitations impacted the redesign. Therefore, certain routines underwent visual adjustments to align with the new standard, while others could be completely rebuilt.
We implemented a step-by-step registration flow, more intuitive and visually pleasant. This approach brought lightness to a naturally denser stage, making the process clearer for users.
We developed personalized email templates for the three user types. All events requiring interaction now follow a communication pattern, strengthening brand identity.
Most of the previous version wasn't responsive. With the redesign, the entire layout was designed with focus on responsiveness, ensuring consistent experience regardless of device.
A componentized style guide was created, designed to facilitate both creation and future maintenance of the interface, following guidelines defined with the marketing team.

handoff.descricao: We worked collaboratively from the early prototyping stages, defining viable scope based on the technology stack and available time for the project. Any technical limitations were identified and adjusted during the prototyping phase.
bullets: Collaboration: Engineering involvement from ideation phase
Feasibility: Only viable and refined routines forwarded to development
Communication: Process promotes fluid integration between designers and developers

resultados.title: Total Responsiveness
resultados.desc: The entire platform started working perfectly on mobile devices, solving one of the main limitations of the previous version.

resultados.title: Optimized Experience
resultados.desc: The new step-by-step registration flow significantly reduced friction and abandonment during office registration.

resultados.title: Visual Identity
resultados.desc: Email templates and style guide created a consistent communication pattern, strengthening the brand.

resultados.title: Design Longevity
resultados.desc: The platform continues to operate today with the same 2021 visual, validating the robustness of the implemented design.

licoes.title: Adaptable Design
licoes.desc: Considering future modifications and expansions is part of planning any redesign - design should be a living organism.

licoes.title: Early Collaboration
licoes.desc: Early engineering involvement ensured that only viable solutions were prototyped, eliminating rework.

licoes.title: Strategic Concessions
licoes.desc: Some design concessions were necessary to meet stakeholders, without compromising usability.

importacaoEmpresas.title: Company Import
importacaoEmpresas.resumo:
This project aims to enhance the "Company Flagging" functionality within the Econodata platform, a work done as part of a technical test for Product Designer.
The central goal is to optimize user experience, dealing with significant challenges that directly impacted operational efficiency.
importacaoEmpresas.objetivo:
Evolve the platform by improving user experience in the "Company Flagging" functionality, as part of a technical test for Product Designer at Econodata.
The proposal aims for a more fluid and intuitive routine that not only meets user needs but also overcomes existing technical limitations.
importacaoEmpresas.desafio:
Improve user experience in the Company Flagging functionality, focusing on addressing recurring pain points that directly impact process efficiency.
Main problems identified include: time waste with manual list cleaning and validation, duplicate or outdated data causing rework.

meuPapel.title: Problem Identification
meuPapel.desc: Identification of current functionality pain points through heuristic analysis and platform testing.

meuPapel.title: Benchmarking
meuPapel.desc: Study of competitors and market players to map best practices and improvement opportunities.

meuPapel.title: Technical Analysis
meuPapel.desc: Evaluation of current routine's technical limitations and proposals to overcome them.

meuPapel.title: Solution Design
meuPapel.desc: Proposal of new routine addressing business objectives and user requests.

processoPesquisa.title: Previous Vision
processoPesquisa.desc: Testing and documentation of current product for in-depth analysis of existing experience and friction point identification.

processoPesquisa.title: CSD Matrix
processoPesquisa.desc: Application of tool to identify Certainties, Suppositions and Doubts, ensuring unified team vision.

processoPesquisa.title: Benchmarking
processoPesquisa.desc: Detailed comparative analysis with competitors to map significant improvement opportunities.

processoPesquisa.title: Wireframes
processoPesquisa.desc: Development of wireframes to validate the solution before high-fidelity prototype.

descobertas.title: List Validation
descobertas.desc: Need for automatic duplicate detection and data enrichment based on CNPJ, domain or email.

descobertas.title: Inconsistent Data
descobertas.desc: Pre-validation needed before import, showing incorrect and duplicate data for user action.

descobertas.title: Duplicate Flagging
descobertas.desc: Integration to automatically mark already approached companies or clients with tags and visual alerts.

descobertas.title: Column Mapping
descobertas.desc: Automatic preview with intelligent column suggestion and visual validation before confirmation.

telas.descricao: Modernization maintaining platform visual standard, with addition of action history for greater transparency, showing who performed each import and when.
Import process redesigned to occur in modal, focusing user attention and divided into three steps for a more didactic and guided flow.
Automatic column mapping based on titles or data patterns, reducing errors and adding option to flag companies that are already clients.
Line and error counters allowing visualization of records to be imported, with inconsistency preview.
Modal allows process execution from other screens like Companies, facilitating operation and tag filter application in the same context.

handoff.descricao: The file was structured to ensure cohesive and accessible understanding for all involved profiles. Within Figma, stages were divided into pages: Research, Benchmarking, Flow, Wireframes and Prototype.
bullets: Organization: Frames grouped in sections according to their functionalities
Componentization: Reused elements organized on the left side of the file
Communication: Structure that contributes to efficiency between teams and minimizes doubts

resultados.title: Optimized Flow
resultados.desc: Import modal divided into clear steps, making the process more intuitive and reducing learning curve.

resultados.title: Error Reduction
resultados.desc: Automatic column mapping and prior validation eliminate common errors in import process.

resultados.title: Greater Transparency
resultados.desc: Action history allows tracking who performed each import and when, increasing accountability.

resultados.title: Unified Experience
resultados.desc: Possibility to execute import from different platform contexts without losing focus.

licoes.title: UX Process
licoes.desc: With more time, personas, user journeys and direct research with real users could be included.

licoes.title: Success Metrics
licoes.desc: Define clear metrics like task time reduction, user satisfaction and error rate decrease.

licoes.title: User Validation
licoes.desc: Ideal would be to make the project available for usability testing and obtain product team feedback.
